name: BuildSsas
description: Build SQL Server Analysis Services Project (Multi dimensional only) into .asdatabase file using devenv.com
author: avdbrink

inputs.name: projCmdSwitch
inputs.label: Command line switch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Rebuild cleans and then builds the specified solution. Build does no cleaning. See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/xee0c8y7.aspx

inputs.name: projConfigName
inputs.label: Project Configuration Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. The name of a Project build configuration that will be used to build the project named in Project File. Default value is $(BuildConfiguration). See: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/abtk353z.aspx

inputs.name: projPlatformName
inputs.label: Project Platform Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the project platform that will be used to build the project named in project File. Default value is $(BuildPlatform).

inputs.name: devenvPath
inputs.label: Location of devenv.com
inputs.helpMarkDown: Location of devenv.com. Usually somewhere inside the visual studio folder. NB: For now the VS17 agent does not seem to contain devenv.com
